org.apache.giraph.comm.messages

接口 MessageStoreByPartition<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    M - Message data
    所有超级接口:
    BasicMessageStore<I,M>, MessageStore<I,M>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    所有已知实现类:
    ByteArrayMessagesPerVertexStore, DiskBackedMessageStoreByPartition, OneMessagePerVertexStore, SimpleMessageStore

    public interface MessageStoreByPartition<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends MessageStore<I,M>
    Message store which stores data by partition

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addPartitionMessages(int partitionId, ByteArrayVertexIdMessages<I,M> messages)
      Adds messages for partition
      void clearPartition(int partitionId)
      Clears messages for a partition.
      Iterable<I> getPartitionDestinationVertices(int partitionId)
      Gets vertex ids from selected partition which we have messages for
      void readFieldsForPartition(DataInput in, int partitionId)
      Deserialize messages for one partition
      void writePartition(DataOutput out, int partitionId)
      Serialize messages for one partition.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.giraph.comm.messages.MessageStore

        getDestinationVertices, getNumberOfMessages, hasMessagesForVertex

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.giraph.comm.messages.BasicMessageStore

        addMessages, clearAll, clearVertexMessages, getVertexMessages

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

        readFields, write

    • 方法详细资料

      • addPartitionMessages

        void addPartitionMessages(int partitionId,
                        ByteArrayVertexIdMessages<I,M> messages)
                          throws IOException
        Adds messages for partition
        参数:
        partitionId - Id of partition
        messages - Collection of vertex ids and messages we want to add
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getPartitionDestinationVertices

        Iterable<I> getPartitionDestinationVertices(int partitionId)
        Gets vertex ids from selected partition which we have messages for
        参数:
        partitionId - Id of partition
        返回:
        Iterable over vertex ids which we have messages for

      • clearPartition

        void clearPartition(int partitionId)
                    throws IOException
        Clears messages for a partition.
        参数:
        partitionId - Partition id for which we want to clear messages
        抛出:
        IOException

      • writePartition

        void writePartition(DataOutput out,
                  int partitionId)
                    throws IOException
        Serialize messages for one partition.
        参数:
        out - DataOutput to serialize this object into
        partitionId - Id of partition
        抛出:
        IOException

      • readFieldsForPartition

        void readFieldsForPartition(DataInput in,
                          int partitionId)
                            throws IOException
        Deserialize messages for one partition
        参数:
        in - DataInput to deserialize this object from.
        partitionId - Id of partition
        抛出:
        IOException
